column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " This is the place . "
#Text=Sokka says : " I ca n't see anything down there . "
#Text=Toph says : " That 's why you have me .
#Text=" Aang says : " I did n't know spirits made prisons like this .
#Text=Who brought you here ?
#Text=" Female prisoner says : " It was no spirit .
#Text=" Male prisoner # 2 says : " It was a witch !
#Text=" Sokka says : " A witch ?
#Text=What do you mean ?
#Text=" Female prisoner says : " She seems like a normal old woman , but she controls people like some dark puppetmaster !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hama !
#Text=" Male prisoner # 1 says : " Yes , the innkeeper !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I knew there was something creepy about her !
#Text=" Aang says : " We have to stop Hama !
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'll get these people out of here .
#Text=You go !
#Text="
